messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] new temporary home of the 'samurai archives'
messages.msgSnippet: It was called Japonius Tryannius, The Japanese Warlord Oda Nobunaga reconsidered by Jeroen Lamars published by Leiden ... From: erik baker
messages.messageBody:
It was called Japonius Tryannius, The Japanese Warlord Oda Nobunaga
reconsidered by Jeroen Lamars published by Leiden
----- Original Message -----
From: erik baker <musashieb@...>
To: <samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, August 22, 2001 2:33 AM
Subject: Re: [samuraihistory] new temporary home of the 'samurai archives'


> Hello,
>
> what was the name of that biography that was released
> on Oda Nobunaga. We talked about it earlier on this
> list and I would like to purchase it. Thanks in
> advance.
>
> Musashi
> --- Christopher West <kitsuno@...> wrote:
> > For the moment, the 'samurai archives' history page
> > can be found here:
> > http://www.angelfire.com/realm/kitsuno01/index.html
> > We should be getting a domain name fairly soon (and
> > a few mirror
> > sites as back ups as well). Please take a look and
> > reply to this
> > message if you find any broken html links at the
> > above address. for
> > the moment only about 2% of the images are viewable.
> > We hope to
> > remedy that within the next few days.
> >
> > c. west
> >
> >
>
>
> __________________________________________________
> Do You Yahoo!?
> Make international calls for as low as $.04/minute with Yahoo! Messenger
> http://phonecard.yahoo.com/
>

messages.subject: Re: new temporary home of the 'samurai archives'
messages.msgSnippet: I have it set up so http://www.samurai-archives.com redirects to the new server, so you can get there via samurai-archives.com.  still in the process of
messages.messageBody:
I have it set up so http://www.samurai-archives.com redirects to the
new server, so you can get there via samurai-archives.com. still in
the process of uploading the remaining pics.

c.

messages.subject: Re: new temporary home of the 'samurai archives'
messages.msgSnippet: Japonius Tryannus: The Japanese Warlord Oda Nobunaga Reconsidered by Jeroen Lamars ... Messenger

by Jeroen Lamars

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] new temporary home of the 'samurai archives'
messages.msgSnippet: Hello, what was the name of that biography that was released on Oda Nobunaga.  We talked about it earlier on this list and I would like to purchase it.  Thanks
messages.messageBody:
Hello,

what was the name of that biography that was released
on Oda Nobunaga. We talked about it earlier on this
list and I would like to purchase it. Thanks in
advance.

Musashi

> For the moment, the 'samurai archives' history page

messages.msgSnippet: Dear Members: I want to show my gratitude to Mr. West and anybody with him for their efforts of securing our website again. Because I am also one of
messages.messageBody:
Dear Members:
I want to show my gratitude to Mr. West and anybody
with him for their efforts of securing our website
again. Because I am also one of beneficiaries from
this great link and people. Thank you.



Sincerely,




Changsub Lee

messages.subject: new temporary home of the 'samurai archives'
messages.msgSnippet: For the moment, the samurai archives history page can be found here: http://www.angelfire.com/realm/kitsuno01/index.html We should be getting a domain name
messages.messageBody:
For the moment, the 'samurai archives' history page can be found here:
http://www.angelfire.com/realm/kitsuno01/index.html
We should be getting a domain name fairly soon (and a few mirror
sites as back ups as well). Please take a look and reply to this
message if you find any broken html links at the above address. for
the moment only about 2% of the images are viewable. We hope to
remedy that within the next few days.

c. west
